General.Name: Catering International & Services S.A.
General.Description: Catering International & Services Société Anonyme provide catering, accommodation, and facilities management services for oil and gas, mining, engineering and construction, defense, and organizations. The company offers sourcing and logistics services; and accommodation management, laundry, cleanliness, and concierge services. It also engages in the design, engineering, and construction; water treatment; shipchandling; skilled personnel recruitment; personnel transport; fleet management; recreational and well-being; waste management; landscaping; and pest control activities, as well as the provision of access control, maintenance, and fire safety services. In addition, the company offers SystemONE, a digital solution that enhances camp management and the quality of life of residents. Catering International & Services Société Anonyme was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Marseille, France.
General.Address: 40 C, avenue de hambourg, Marseille, France, 13008
